title: iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and advanced triple-camera system for professional photography.

description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra comes with a powerful Snapdragon processor, 200MP camera, and S-Pen support for productivity lovers.

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Pixel 8 Pro offers an exceptional camera experience, clean Android UI, and AI-powered features with long-term updates.

title: Xiaomi 13 Pro

title: iPhone 13

title: Samsung Galaxy A54
description: Galaxy A54 is a mid-range smartphone with a vibrant AMOLED display, reliable camera, and strong battery backup.

title: Realme GT Neo 5

title: Nothing Phone (2)
